name: dev-senior
author: openclaw0205
description: Senior software developer - architecture design, code review, technical solutions, debugging, and best practices

items.q: What can Senior Developer help me with?
items.a: Architecture design, code review, debugging complex issues, choosing tech stacks, writing clean maintainable code, and implementing best practices.

items.q: Which programming languages does it support?
items.a: Proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Go, Java, PHP, and Rust. Can quickly adapt to other languages based on documentation.

items.q: How does it approach code review?
items.a: Focuses on readability, maintainability, performance, and security. Points out issues with concrete suggestions, not just criticism. Explains the 'why' behind recommendations.

items.q: Can it help with system design?
items.a: Yes - designs scalable architectures, draws system diagrams, identifies bottlenecks, and recommends appropriate patterns (microservices, event-driven, etc.).
Systematic debugging approach: reproduce → isolate → hypothesize → verify. Uses logs, profilers, and debuggers effectively. Explains root cause, not just the fix.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于高级开发者的常见问题

items.q: 高级开发者能帮我做什么？
items.a: 架构设计、代码审查、复杂问题调试、技术选型、编写可维护的代码，以及落地最佳实践。
精通 JavaScript/TypeScript、Python、Go、Java、PHP 和 Rust。其他语言可以根据文档快速上手。

items.q: 代码审查的方式是什么？
items.a: 关注可读性、可维护性、性能和安全性。指出问题的同时给出具体建议，不只是批评。解释建议背后的原因。
可以 - 设计可扩展的架构、画系统图、识别瓶颈，推荐合适的模式（微服务、事件驱动等）。
系统化的调试方法：复现 → 隔离 → 假设 → 验证。善用日志、性能分析器和调试器。解释根本原因，不只是修复方法。
